feed.title: NeoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.10.4.4
entry.content:
Danish translation and various fixes

New Contributors

  • @pmakholm made their first contribution in https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/pull/716
  • @dnoesgaard made their first contribution in https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/pull/722

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.10.4.5
entry.content: add game release type fix minor issues with Bandcamp and TMDB

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.10.4.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add book format enum to edition
  • Support "sending" emails to console in debug mode by @pmakholm in https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/pull/735
  • Update zh-Tw translation of django.po by @den13501 in https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/pull/736
  • Add new link format from Douban app

New Contributors

  • @den13501 made their first contribution in https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/pull/736

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.10.4.7
entry.content:
• Fix login by friendica
  • Fix login by firefish
  • use API key for google books API call

entry.title: New release for NeoDB:
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add qidian,ypshuo parser by @j1g5awi
  • add fediverse:creator tag to posts/identities
  • improve login compatibility with Sharkey
  • fix missing title in discog parser

New Contributors

  • @j1g5awi made their first contribution in https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/pull/743
